ISSUE.TITLE: Error on post to launches/query
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hey, I'm getting an error "Cannot read property 'replace' of undefined" for every post request to the "api.spacexdata.com/v4/launches/query" if the request contains "populate" option. Yesterday everything worked fine, I suppose the cause lies in the last commits. Please, take a look

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #857 add query formatting for v4 launches
